  16. ‌#define CAML_INTERNALS

  18. /* The table-driven automaton for lexers generated by camllex. */

  20. #include "caml/fail.h"
  21. #include "caml/mlvalues.h"
  22. #include "caml/fiber.h"

  24. ‌struct lexer_buffer {
  25.   value refill_buff;
  26.   value lex_buffer;
  27.   value lex_buffer_len;
  28.   value lex_abs_pos;
  29.   value lex_start_pos;
  30.   value lex_curr_pos;
  31.   value lex_last_pos;
  32.   value lex_last_action;
  33.   value lex_eof_reached;
  34.   value lex_mem;
  35.   value lex_start_p;
  36.   value lex_curr_p;
  37. };

  39. ‌struct lexing_table {
  40.   value lex_base;
  41.   value lex_backtrk;
  42.   value lex_default;
  43.   value lex_trans;
  44.   value lex_check;
  45.   value lex_base_code;
  46.   value lex_backtrk_code;
  47.   value lex_default_code;
  48.   value lex_trans_code;
  49.   value lex_check_code;
  50.   value lex_code;
  51. };

  53. #if defined(ARCH_BIG_ENDIAN) || SIZEOF_SHORT != 2
  54. ‌#define Short(tbl,n) \
  55.   (*((unsigned char *)((tbl) + (n) * 2)) + \
  56.           (*((signed char *)((tbl) + (n) * 2 + 1)) << 8))
  57. #else
  58. ‌#define Short(tbl,n) (((short *)(tbl))[(n)])
  59. #endif

  61. ‌CAMLprim value caml_lex_engine(struct lexing_table *tbl, value start_state,
  62.                                struct lexer_buffer *lexbuf)
  63. {
  64.   int state, base, backtrk, c;

  66.   state = Int_val(start_state);
  67.   if (state >= 0) {
  68.     /* First entry */
  69.     lexbuf->lex_last_pos = lexbuf->lex_start_pos = lexbuf->lex_curr_pos;
  70.     lexbuf->lex_last_action = Val_int(-1);
  71.   } else {
  72.     /* Reentry after refill */
  73.     state = -state - 1;
  74.   }
  75.   while(1) {
  76.     /* Lookup base address or action number for current state */
  77.     base = Short(tbl->lex_base, state);
  78.     if (base < 0) return Val_int(-base-1);
  79.     /* See if it's a backtrack point */
  80.     backtrk = Short(tbl->lex_backtrk, state);
  81.     if (backtrk >= 0) {
  82.       lexbuf->lex_last_pos = lexbuf->lex_curr_pos;
  83.       lexbuf->lex_last_action = Val_int(backtrk);
  84.     }
  85.     /* See if we need a refill */
  86.     if (lexbuf->lex_curr_pos >= lexbuf->lex_buffer_len){
  87.       if (lexbuf->lex_eof_reached == Val_bool (0)){
  88.         return Val_int(-state - 1);
  89.       }else{
  90.         c = 256;
  91.       }
  92.     }else{
  93.       /* Read next input char */
  94.       c = Byte_u(lexbuf->lex_buffer, Long_val(lexbuf->lex_curr_pos));
  95.       lexbuf->lex_curr_pos += 2;
  96.     }
  97.     /* Determine next state */
  98.     if (Short(tbl->lex_check, base + c) == state)
  99.       state = Short(tbl->lex_trans, base + c);
  100.     else
  101.       state = Short(tbl->lex_default, state);
  102.     /* If no transition on this char, return to last backtrack point */
  103.     if (state < 0) {
  104.       lexbuf->lex_curr_pos = lexbuf->lex_last_pos;
  105.       if (lexbuf->lex_last_action == Val_int(-1)) {
  106.         caml_failwith("lexing: empty token");
  107.       } else {
  108.         return lexbuf->lex_last_action;
  109.       }
  110.     }else{
  111.       /* Erase the EOF condition only if the EOF pseudo-character was
  112.          consumed by the automaton (i.e. there was no backtrack above)
  113.        */
  114.       if (c == 256) lexbuf->lex_eof_reached = Val_bool (0);
  115.     }
  116.   }
  117. }

  119. /***********************************************/
  120. /* New lexer engine, with memory of positions  */
  121. /***********************************************/

  123. ‌static void run_mem(char *pc, value mem, value curr_pos) {
  124.   for (;;) {
  125.     unsigned char dst, src ;

  127.     dst = *pc++ ;
  128.     if (dst == 0xff)
  129.       return ;
  130.     src = *pc++ ;
  131.     if (src == 0xff) {
  132.       /*      fprintf(stderr,"[%hhu] <- %d\n",dst,Int_val(curr_pos)) ;*/
  133.       Field(mem,dst) = curr_pos ;
  134.     } else {
  135.       /*      fprintf(stderr,"[%hhu] <- [%hhu]\n",dst,src) ; */
  136.       Field(mem,dst) = Field(mem,src) ;
  137.     }
  138.   }
  139. }

  141. ‌static void run_tag(char *pc, value mem) {
  142.   for (;;) {
  143.     unsigned char dst, src ;

  145.     dst = *pc++ ;
  146.     if (dst == 0xff)
  147.       return ;
  148.     src = *pc++ ;
  149.     if (src == 0xff) {
  150.       /*      fprintf(stderr,"[%hhu] <- -1\n",dst) ; */
  151.       Field(mem,dst) = Val_int(-1) ;
  152.     } else {
  153.       /*      fprintf(stderr,"[%hhu] <- [%hhu]\n",dst,src) ; */
  154.       Field(mem,dst) = Field(mem,src) ;
  155.     }
  156.   }
  157. }

  159. ‌CAMLprim value caml_new_lex_engine(struct lexing_table *tbl, value start_state,
  160.                                    struct lexer_buffer *lexbuf)
  161. {
  162.   int state, base, backtrk, c, pstate ;
  163.   state = Int_val(start_state);
  164.   if (state >= 0) {
  165.     /* First entry */
  166.     lexbuf->lex_last_pos = lexbuf->lex_start_pos = lexbuf->lex_curr_pos;
  167.     lexbuf->lex_last_action = Val_int(-1);
  168.   } else {
  169.     /* Reentry after refill */
  170.     state = -state - 1;
  171.   }
  172.   while(1) {
  173.     /* Lookup base address or action number for current state */
  174.     base = Short(tbl->lex_base, state);
  175.     if (base < 0) {
  176.       int pc_off = Short(tbl->lex_base_code, state) ;
  177.       run_tag(Bp_val(tbl->lex_code) + pc_off, lexbuf->lex_mem);
  178.       /*      fprintf(stderr,"Perform: %d\n",-base-1) ; */
  179.       return Val_int(-base-1);
  180.     }
  181.     /* See if it's a backtrack point */
  182.     backtrk = Short(tbl->lex_backtrk, state);
  183.     if (backtrk >= 0) {
  184.       int pc_off =  Short(tbl->lex_backtrk_code, state);
  185.       run_tag(Bp_val(tbl->lex_code) + pc_off, lexbuf->lex_mem);
  186.       lexbuf->lex_last_pos = lexbuf->lex_curr_pos;
  187.       lexbuf->lex_last_action = Val_int(backtrk);

  189.     }
  190.     /* See if we need a refill */
  191.     if (lexbuf->lex_curr_pos >= lexbuf->lex_buffer_len){
  192.       if (lexbuf->lex_eof_reached == Val_bool (0)){
  193.         return Val_int(-state - 1);
  194.       }else{
  195.         c = 256;
  196.       }
  197.     }else{
  198.       /* Read next input char */
  199.       c = Byte_u(lexbuf->lex_buffer, Long_val(lexbuf->lex_curr_pos));
  200.       lexbuf->lex_curr_pos += 2;
  201.     }
  202.     /* Determine next state */
  203.     pstate=state ;
  204.     if (Short(tbl->lex_check, base + c) == state)
  205.       state = Short(tbl->lex_trans, base + c);
  206.     else
  207.       state = Short(tbl->lex_default, state);
  208.     /* If no transition on this char, return to last backtrack point */
  209.     if (state < 0) {
  210.       lexbuf->lex_curr_pos = lexbuf->lex_last_pos;
  211.       if (lexbuf->lex_last_action == Val_int(-1)) {
  212.         caml_failwith("lexing: empty token");
  213.       } else {
  214.         return lexbuf->lex_last_action;
  215.       }
  216.     }else{
  217.       /* If some transition, get and perform memory moves */
  218.       int base_code = Short(tbl->lex_base_code, pstate) ;
  219.       int pc_off ;
  220.       if (Short(tbl->lex_check_code, base_code + c) == pstate)
  221.         pc_off = Short(tbl->lex_trans_code, base_code + c) ;
  222.       else
  223.         pc_off = Short(tbl->lex_default_code, pstate) ;
  224.       if (pc_off > 0)
  225.         run_mem(Bp_val(tbl->lex_code) + pc_off, lexbuf->lex_mem,
  226.                 lexbuf->lex_curr_pos) ;
  227.       /* Erase the EOF condition only if the EOF pseudo-character was
  228.          consumed by the automaton (i.e. there was no backtrack above)
  229.        */
  230.       if (c == 256) lexbuf->lex_eof_reached = Val_bool (0);
  231.     }
  232.   }
  233. }
